message.body: Do you remember where you got that royalty free football game footage for FW
Archive.org. I just typed in football and a bunch of high school games popped up
I can't find an entire pro looking baseball game:/
Damn that might be kind of tough. High school/college baseball prob isn't taped as much
Can I use some of those future weather stills for my site? I'm listing and linking you as prod designer on that page as well
The stills on your cargo site
Ask Jenny
Ok. I'll send her an email
I heard a body got pulled from set (the river) today. Crazy shit
Crazy dude
Are you going to pnb tonight?
Yeah man. Just got my ticket online
You going?
Yeah I'm waiting PBS response from kev Gallagher he prob wants a ticket to
Wtf
Nice. This band serpent throne is opening, I remember him talking about liking them
Word CJ is coming
Awesome. I'll be there a little after 8 because I want to see the first two bands serpent throne and purling hiss
Where you at we at Frankford hall
On my way
Today is the great Philly grill off we should go
Haha the Rachel ray thing? When and where is it?
That park across from geno's and pats...capitolos or something
I'd go check it out
Yo you wanna meet down there at like 345 or so
At pats
Where you at?
The pope but we cashin out...what's good you wanna meet up at the tap room or something
Yeah def. Lemmie know when your there and I'll head up
Word
We here
Cool ill walk up
Yo can you feed my cat on like Tuesday or Wednesday?
Ill be in NYC til late tues. But I can do it on wed.
Word. Are you in NY now?
Nope. Leaving early tomm morning
Aight I can drop key off later tonight if you're gonna be around?
Yeah I'll be grilling some food here. If you got some time your welcome to hang
I'll hit you up
I forgot to ask you what your apt number is
Thanks
How's my cat doin?
I'm going to feed him in two hours when im back in philly. Got stuck late at a NYC shoot. Sorry man
Word
Stoli enjoyed his cat cereal
Thanks. Where u @ dawg
I'm back in Philly doing a home depot run. You back today?
Yes I'll call u in an hour
Ok
Yo we here
Oschino fresh out of State Rd on cosmic Kev tonight
Your girl Beth mickle killed it on drive dude. Looked great. Awesome movie...
Word, I want to see that
Alexandria shoot is going to be easy. Thanks for tossing it my way
Yessiree
Where in CT you going?
If I leave at noon I'll get to new haven around...?
I'd say 3.5 - 4 hrs. You going to new haven? Stop at frank pepe's for white clam pizza
We're going to a party with a big green pizza truck...
Haha awesome. Enjoy man
What are the shady houses in savanna called?
Traps?
Yup . They call crackhouses trap houses down south
Also a gucci mane record...dnk that
Yup. Jeezy talks about trappin all the time
Pepe's sell slices?
Or just pies?
Not really sure. I'd call them up
Ok
I've always got pies
How's sally's apizza?
Never had it but they are pepe's competition. Modern apizza is another one
And what about this burger joint...
Louis' lunch is great. They claim to have served the first hamburger in America
Yeah...we've been told to check it out
Bangin. Pepe's?
Yessir
Enjoy that apizza man. I love the little bit of char
Do you know what day I start pre-pro on Lurking Fear?
Hey sorry I don't have more answers for you B. Should know very soon though...
Thanks for your patience
That's cool. Thanks man
What's the good Indian place in cherry hill
Palace of Asia. Behind a motel. Soo good
Yo buddy
Sup
No word yet
But...do you wanna grill tonight?
Lemmie see what jess is up to when I get home. Running errands right now. I'll hit you up in a bit
Word
Yeah we could BBQ at my house tonight. I got some wings to smoke if you want to bring some ground beef for burgers
Word is Jess gonna be around?
Yeah
Actually I gotta post pone our BBQ cus it's Brian birthday tonight and he wanted to go out possibly to SP Taproom. BBQ later in the week?
Aight Yeager lemme know
Yeager?
Yeah
Haha aight. I'll brine the wings in the meantime
BBQ tonight?
Yeah man...
Nancy and I are going down to the protest to check it out. I'll call you around 4 or so...
Ok
Pushing til after Halloween they say ...
Damn, that's cool though
Yo nikes are gettin pricey. Not a lot under 100 worth coppin...
Yeah I know especially for air maxes. Check out kicks USA they always have good sale shit
You're right. Selection weak tho
Yeah it's usually pretty mixed. Which one you go to?
Cherry hill mall
Yeah that one kinda sucks. Best place for finding sneakers is the gallery. Tons of options in one place, good sales
Soft hold for sat and sun in ny?
Designer may want another guy...
Wanted me to give heads up
Sounds good lemmie know
K
￼Nba deli b
Haha weird
Yo man. I'm working in NYC until Friday but let me know if you hear anything new with lurking fear or anything else
Nah. Why?
Yo did you get a call from a dude chris?
Put your name in for a thing in Delaware. I had to pull out...
Word. Thanks man.
It starts on the 13th I think...
Hit him up.
Yeah
I'm at pho ha
Ok, I saw that email address on film.org a while ago. I assume the lurking fear is looking grim?
Haha nice. You got anything coming?
I'm on a real shitty thing at the bates motel now...2 more weeks. Real small and bad. Might be able to day play you here and there. Let you know...
Cool
￼69th. St ...been here? Looks good
No it's supposed to be pretty good though for old stuff
I'm going to PD that Delaware feature. Thanks for the hook up bro!
Word..
Nope
Do you know of anyone else working on it?

Just sent call sheet. You're gonna get there at call. I'll be about an hour behind you. All you have to do is move what the DP needs out of bedroom set for dolls and shit and take some books from library and get them in the bedroom...easy. Also there shou

Do you think this will go until 2am like it says on the call sheet? Cuz if it does I unfortunately can't do it because I have to be in long island city on Monday for a shoot at 6:30. That means I have to leave Philly at 4am. Call me when you get a chance
Lemmie know when you've found someone, or need more contact options. hope it didn't fuck things up too bad
Taryn ginna do it
Ok good. Tell expressway g&e I said what up
And cutie pie Danielle Harris from stake land but she def won't remember me haha
What's his face said what up
Jeremy spears
Fx cat
Yeah Brian spears was the man! He played an old lady vampire with her tits out and attacks the heroes. One of the best scenes in the movie, ask him about haha
Do you know if home depot would have fullers earth or do I have to go to a pool store?
My house
Where are you
Y'all got that number?
Thanks
Did you hit Ian up?
Yeah and I gave his contact to the dude.
Yeah just finished day 1
You in DE?
How was it?
Actually pretty great, everyone's very pro. Finished our day super early
Awesome
Did it look good?
How was the prop handoff?
Did they get it all?

Yeah they did a good job, I just had to make a few modifications to things. The fathers house location is awesome, old house with tin ceilings. Dressed with lots of musical stuff and fringe philosophical texts
You start that new feature yet?
Na they unhired me dude
Wack, they didn't have the budget?
I'll tell you the story. Really fucked up. Just hired me then totally renigged on it...went with some agency dude....cause they're using the agency for DP, editor, literary legal....
Really unpro. Had nothing to do with me...just political.
That's shitty man. If you need to book some work I can give your contact to the dude in NYC Ian worked for. Nice day rates
http://www.pcgamer.com/2011/06/02/saints-row-3-preview-2/
Never played any of those games but it sounds cool
Yeah I just had a meeting with josh Cohen...I guess he did a commercial for the the game with Tim and Eric
Sounded right up your ally
How was today ?
You check out gods way?
Nice. It was easy, all car interior shit, got a bunch of shopping done
Not yet, I went to a thrift store in rehobeth called new life. Good shit, super cheap
Yeah that's a good one too...
Good fried chicken at Jimmy's in bridgeville
It's like a half hour away
M
So while I'm down here, anywhere particular I should eat/drink/see?
Nice, I'll check it out
This area is super dead right now. Went to a Walmart today with only 10 cars in the lot
I don't know what's still open though
Great ice cream in the main drag in rehoboth right off the boardwalk
I believe it. In August...forget about it. The whole county is a madhouse
Yeah. I want to go get crabs soon. The executive producer owns a ton of restaurants in the area, he's gonna hook it up
I don't think I've ever had them in the fall/winter.
Yeah they prob wouldn't be Maryland blue, maybe dungeoness or something
￼Bungee caribeener
Nice, never seen one of those
￼Silicone
Going up to work for Jesse nemeth tomorrow. Thanks for the rec
Awesome tell him I said what up
Pretty cool shoot today
Annie Leibovitz style old Hollywood movie lights and camera...awesome matte painting...looked real good
Nice, which studio did you shoot in?
I don't even know...it was more like a warehouse with a distro box
In bk
Word. Haha that make up mirror we built for a MAC cosmetics shoot months ago and have reused it a million times
It's so fucked
Its literally falling apart
Haha yup. It was in great shape until UPS dropped it off the back off a truck on our Nashville shoot
Haha
Yo I just bought a ton of teen girl bedroom dressings and cosmetic shit at the dollar store and the register person said "who's the lucky lady?" and I said with a straight face "nah for me" and left
Hahahaha
Great
Yup
She wasnt even fazed because we are in the gay capital of beach towns
This editorial shit is so cushy and easy
Soooooo easy. Set up, let the ambiguously foreign photographer and an army of women in designer shawls do their thing, sit around and eat, break down, go home
￼The extras get a delicious feast tonight
Did they scarf it down like true blue hens?
Haha yup, as we speak
What up with that chicken?
Let's make some ribs instead, haven't had them since summer. I can get smoked out tues weds or thurs
Yo you wanna meet us at Le Viet?
Supposed to be real good...
CJ might come too
Im working on another HIV PSA in DE right now, not going to be home til 9ish. I'm def down to smoke food this week though, lemmie know what night is good for you
Bet
Yo we at the tap room if you wanna meet us when you get back
Ok cool, still here wrapping. I gotta eat first and if it's not too late I'll come by
Are you coming to the bar home slice?
Yeah just got done eating, be up in 15 min
Words
Walking up
K
You want to BBQ tomm?
Yeah what are we gonna cook
I have a whole chicken and I'll make collared greens, you want to bring some ribs? Nothing huge, just a pack of country ribs or something like that.
Yeah no prob
Can Logan and CJ come
Can we fit two chicks?
Aight...
We can do two chickens and ribs all at once?
Yeah it's a pretty decent size smoker
Ok
Ok
Let's start smoking at 4 so we could eat at a reasonable time
Yup. Her friends Amanda and Jamie are coming too
Is Jess gonna be there?
Word it's gonna be epic
Should we smother the chickens in something ?
Def man, i wish the pickles were ready to eat with the bbq. I'll make potato salad too
One we should do dry rub and butter Memphis style and the other one I'll make a st louis BBQ sauce
Butter
Nice
Ok you need any spice stuff? Nancy has lots
Nah I'm good, got everything we need
It says 70% rain tomm, is there another day this week a BBQ would work for you?
Thursday
Jess can't cuz of work, we'll just do it tomm, the rain seems to be mostly in the morning
Aight
Could you pick up the second chicken? I'm grabbing the sides, charcoal, and wood right now
Awesome
Yup
On it
What was that sausage we had?
The dry
We didn't end up getting to eat the linguica because I forgot about it and burnt it hell, I threw it away haha
Just cannulis hot fennel sausage
Ahhhh
That's what I wanted to know though
Next time I'm in CT I'll get more for us to eat. Can't find it in Philly.
Oh yeah with the studio space, I thought about it and don't really need it right now. I got my basement set up for now and don't need another expense even though I know it's cheap
Thanks man! How dem pickled thangs?
Merry Christmas to you and nancy. Sip on that nog!
Really good. I got a jar for you, we made way too many haha
Nice
7th and jackson for viet hoagies?
And the coffee is across the street still?
Word
Yeah we can meet you there
Yup. I just got to the gym. If you wanna wait for me I'll be ready by 230
Cool. I'll hit you up in a bit
We here
On my way
Word not sold out
Cool
What kind of foliage you need b?
Tropical and/or low scrubby desert plants. The set look is still being decided on. I'd rent from American foliage but this is a one-man art dept job and they can't pay me for NYC pickups and returns
Well if they don't have the money for ny pickups then they def don't have the bread for artificial plants...real expensive money...
See what them factory has
The American instinct is the right move though
What's the project?
Yeah that's what I'm telling this dude. I could give them a simple desert set with home depot purchases and theme factory rentals but def not a lush jungle
Supposed to be a cheesy 1950s b-movie style caveman set
Like roger corman shit?
A music video for some woman I've never heard of. She's a cavewoman who will be fighting stop motion dinos
Could be pretty fun
Exactly
What the budge?
Not sure yet but prob pretty low, they are still getting it together. It doesn't shoot until the end of the month so I got time
Yeah they should just produce it right...
Tell them you need a guy and bring me on...
Definitely, I'm working on that as well
Shooting at invincible studios
Oh jeez
Who's doing it?
Haha never been in it. Is it terrible?
Dude who produced that movie streets, Todd Wolfe
It's a Cyc wall. In a warehouse
No gear..no resources....it's pretty Philly
Haha oh man
I'm on my way to the sixers opener. Bout to shit on the pistons
You wanna get pho with me and CJ
Oh shit
Fuck the D
Eminen kidzzzzzzzz
*eminem
Yup. Real bad
Trashed em
You know what time 7th and jackson closes?
Might get pho tonight...you're welcome to come out with us.
Prob really soon. Lemmie check
Open till 6 but closed on Monday's
Yessir
I actually just got ingredients to cook tonight, thanks though
￼Philly Pholiage

A long grass tuft to bury in sand
Jordan heels
Haha so terrible

No the other one that had furniture upstairs...just thrift store.
Oh yeah a little further up

My shits just stopped coming like a week ago...
Yeah I get them all day
Weird. Hit up the moderator I guess

Damn
Ok
Sixers dude! They're hot right now
Def. Also the heat sell tons of tickets wherever they play because of lebron/wade
Are you in NY or back in Philly?
PHL

Cool
Yeah im going to see what they have at AC moore first and then do the insulation foam thing if I can't find anything. I've seen the pink stuff pretty thick, like 3in so I won't have to stack it
I'm finishing up our list now and I'll share it as a google do
List sent, can I call you in a bit and we'll go through it?
At like noon...
Ok
Gimmie 15, had to hit home depot
Hows that Oscar lookin man?
Pretty good, I'll send you a pic after the second coat later.
Word up
Awesome dude
Pretty much, looks like a carved piece of foam painted cartoony yellow
Perfect right? Just what he asked for...
Feels pretty sturdy too which surprised me
He go you have an account with state?
Do you ^
Nah I've never personally rented with them. Once we have our reservation picked the producer said she will fax/email credit card authorization
Do they have an account with state? Cause there's more paperwork than just the cc auth....an agent has to show you around yadda yadda
It more involved than just shopping and paying...
Damn I didn't realize that, I doubt they have one. The producer Michelle will do whatever paperwork etc. needs to be done.
Cool I'll check now and email her
Ok maybe they have the paperwork on their website....
If she could fill that stuff out in the am we could be in and out in no time...
It will speed things up but not a huge deal.
Yeah I'll send an email, also they open at 830 not 8 like I though

Just got an email from the producer. We are going to be delayed our start by a couple hours tomm, they are still waiting on Mike Myers scheduling bullshit. I'll call state when they open to see what they have and square that away, and I'll keep you posted
Just called state, they have everything. Now all we can do is wait. I got all the paperwork needed so I'm having the producer finish that now
Sweet im just hangin out...
Word
I know that's what I keep telling them
Dude they're blowing it the day is gonna be shot soon
What's the status holmes?
Copy that...
They didn't call yet, I'm calling her now
The shoot has been officially moved to Thurs. Sucks, I wouldve liked to have ya
Aight
Im gonna see if Log is around
Is your shoot happening ?
Yup, just cut down a bit based on who they were able to cast. Kevin Kline is on his way haha
Ive never seen a Kevin Kline movie
Me neither! Our moms have though haha
He asked me to just hold onto them
You gonna drop jesse's blankets off tomorrow?
He asked about them...
Word, he texted me about them around 8
Cool
Dropping truck now
Word I have another hour here with Jesse he has me for another hour so we're going to the shop to do something til 12
If you gotta roll out...you can go. I could take the china bus
To I think that lunches have made me a lil sick dog...feelin like I got a case of the bad burger meat blues
Damn that sucks, local all organic e-coli
Donuts?
Yeah what time do you wanna go?
You want to meet me there in an hour?
Ok
I can meet you guys there even sooner, I'm ready if you are
I am not ready...it's just me. Nancy is going To the gym. Ill meet you there at like 1130 -1140
Ok
Another option is waiting a bit longer and getting Cambodian food with Barone down here
If you wanna get that...by all means, you should but I can't my day is revolving around Nancy's schedule a little..
I only have a small window here...
Aight let's get donuts at 1130
I'm here, it's packed
5 min
Ok
Have you been to resurrection ale house?
Nah I hear they have pretty good food though
Where's the best real dollar store in south
I like deal$ on Oregon ave a lot and then EZ Dollar plus at 10th and Snyder for weird random stuff
Yo I tried Frangelli's bakery today. No need for federal donuts man...that place is fucking irrelevant
I heard frangelli's has really good donuts, I'm walking down there this week
The sticky buns are apparently the specialty...which I didn't know. I got a glazed and an Italian cream filled. More doughy than cakey...
Which is what i like...
Yeah i gotta try them. I'm about to get Aldo's
Oh you lucky SOB

Only big bongs in clear
Ok...today's not a good day but I Fo wanna get one soon. We're wasting nug rolling pinners

￼This ones pretty sweet, it's got texture to it
Haha
Yeah
Cool, I'll grab it for you
It's only $20 I'll spot you
That's 20?
I'll take it.
Looks good to me
Does he have Paypal?
Or you can grab it....

Cool

Aw shit
No I'm making food

You got to try indonesian noodle soup from sky cafe next to my house. Prob my favorite Asian soup
It's called mie komplit

Cool

When we frying chickens

Btw I wanna smoke meat next weekend if you're down
Maybe a duck...?
Yeah that could be cool, never had smoked duck
Do you know how to clean one of your bro's pipes?
I'll text him and ask
This thing is gettin a little stinky...
Cool thanks man
He said gently scrub it with running alcohol and kosher salt for grit
Haha the drama king of NYC
Chyeah!
An Albanian restaurant opened a few blocks from my house. You, me and Action Bronson should go check it out soon
Are you available this weekend and next week too?
Ok
This weekend im free. I have 2 shoots next week. One early in the week and then one for next weekend
Why you got shoots coming up?
Word, thanks for contacting me though
No...it's someone else but they're looking for someone the whole time
All or nothing...also very low
You want to eat some food this weekend?
I do...
I want to take you guys to the Indonesian place Sky Cafe right by my house. Best Indonesian in the city
We should do a flea or two then get smokin
We could smoke a fish...
Duck
Chicken
Whatev you think
Possibly, don't really feel like smoking anything this weekend. Did some stuff last weekend I still have left overs of

I will tell you this about nancy...she doesn't love Indonesian food
We can go somewhere else, I get sky cafe all the time
But we'll give it a shot
Korean BBQ
Yup!
Word
Let's get a group together so we can order a bunch of stuff. My favorite place is Seorabol in olney
Yeah it's great
Log and CJ
Me and nancy
Yup
Barrone

Producers of antiques road show are gonna be there filming a spin off called market warriors
